🔷️ Interface: Tips for Interacting. Theme Change - Tap the Title to toggle Dark and Light Themes. Double Clicking/Tapping a Search Card will apppend to saved items. Interactive Results - Click text such as ARG Shifts and Names for cross-data lookup.
🔶️ Handling: Tips for File Usage. Processing is based on filenames: Editing the name can work for or against you depending on the name and desired results.
🔷️ Other: Miscellaneous Tips. Working file types: XLSX, DB, PDF.
